issue.title: [Dev][Release] Binary upload script keeps raising locale warnings
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8814](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8814). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The console output is filled with warnings which makes hard to follow what happens.
